results.title: Missed bins and bags | South Staffordshire District Council
results.snippet: Bin and bag collections can be made any time up to 18:00 on your collection day. Please report missed bins and bags before 17:00 following your collection date.

results.title: Customer Feedback | South Staffordshire District Council
results.snippet: Please note, if your bin has been missed this must be reported to us by 5pm the next working day. Complaints that fall outside our procedure.

context.need: I forgot to put my bin out and need to report that I would like it collected.

recommendation.reason: Link appears suitable for user needs
next_steps: Follow the link to access the content

Reason.need: I forgot to put my bin out and need to report that I would like it collected.
Reason.reasoning: The provided content describes the process for reporting a missed bin collection; the resident simply needs to contact the Council using their online form, available at https://www.sstaffs.gov.uk/online-services/make-a-complaint or by calling the Customer Service Centre on 0300 131 5555.
Reason.next_actions: Visit the provided link or call the specified phone number to report a missed bin collection.

analysis.overall_assessment: This content appears to effectively serve my needs as a council resident by providing clear instructions on how to report a missed bin collection and offering multiple options for contacting the Council.
